questions_and_notes: Why is this variable needed given request for gppLut-Emon?  If this is only of interest to understanding the atmospheric budget cell_methods should include "over all_area_types.  Root can be simplified by leaving off the suffix and just define as "gpp" since the area type is indicated in suffix.
cell_methods: area: time: mean where natural_grasses (comment: mask=grassFrac)
long_name: Gross Primary Production on Grass Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
comment: Total GPP of grass in the grid cell
